titleStmt.title: Sions sonets. Sung by Solomon the King, and periphras'd by Fra. Quarles
Bible. O.T. Lamentations. English. Quarles. Paraphrases.
titleStmt.author: Quarles, Francis, 1592-1644.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Stansby for Thomas Dewe, and are to bee sold at his shoppe in Saint Dunstanes Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 20554 on UMI microfilm reel 1215.
Reproductions of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Appears at reel 1215 and at reel 1539 (same copy filmed twice).

place.placeName: his shoppe in Saint Dunstanes Church-yard
